summary: This document is an invoice from FedEx addressed to Jeffrey Epstein, detailing transportation charges for services rendered. The invoice includes billing information, payment details, and a summary of charges, indicating a total amount due of $12.92. It also outlines changes in FedEx policies regarding invoice adjustments effective April 1, 2001.
